title._content: ["Indian Ridge," Dr. Francis Bishop Harrington house, 166 Argilla Road, Ipswich, Massachusetts. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Indian Ridge," Dr. Francis Bishop Harrington house, 166 Argilla Road, Ipswich, Massachusetts. Flower border] [1926] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Built circa 1903. Associated Name: Josephine Ruggles (Mrs. Francis B.) Harrington. On slide: Unprinted paper mask has the type of gold-border boxes used by slide manufacturer T.H. McAllister-Keller Co., Inc. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16804 Call Number: LC-J717-X108- 77
